output_list.criticism: The function allows transferring 10,000 tokens to multiple addresses at once, which can lead to an integer overflow if the number of addresses is large.
The function allows transferring 5,000 tokens to multiple addresses at once, which can lead to an integer overflow if the number of addresses is large.
The function allows transferring 1,000 tokens to multiple addresses at once, which can lead to an integer overflow if the number of addresses is large.
The function allows transferring any amount of tokens to multiple addresses at once, which can lead to an integer overflow if the number of addresses is large.
The constructor function `MalaysianCoin` has a typo in the variable name `Buterin`. The variable name should be `Buterin` instead of `Buterin`.
